title: The RETURN of the LIVING DEAD - 30th Anniversary Soundtrack
description:
This is my fan edit of the soundtrack to the 1985 horror/comedy "The Return of the Living Dead." I have taken the original 10-song soundtrack album, remastered and rearranged the tracks, and added sound clips from the movie to make listening more of an "experience" for fans of the film. Also included is audio of the Main Title Theme as well as the End Credit Montage, both of which were taken from the DVD audio.

x     x     x

(Track Listing)

1) "Weird Things" [Dialogue Spoken by Thom Matthews & James Karen]

2) PARTYTIME (ZOMBIE VERSION) - 45 Grave

3) TRIOXIN (MAIN TITLE THEME) - Matt Clifford

4) NOTHING FOR YOU - TSOL

5) "A Way Of Life" [Dialogue spoken by Mark Venturini & Linnea Quigley]

6) WITHOUT A FACE - The Flesheaters

7) LOVE UNDER WILL - The Jet Black Berries

8) "Trash Is Taking Off Her Clothes Again" [Dialogue Spoken by Linnea Quigley, Miguel A. Nunez, Jr. & John Philbin]

9) TONIGHT (WE'LL MAKE LOVE UNTIL WE DIE) - SSQ

10) BURN THE FLAMES - Roky Erickson

11) "Dead People Screaming" [Dialogue spoken by Don Calfa, Miguel A. Nunez, Jr., Beverly Randolph & Brian Peck]

12) SURFIN' DEAD - The Cramps

13) "We Gotta Get The F*** Out" [Dialogue spoken by Miguel A. Nunez, Jr.]

14) TAKE A WALK - Tall Boys

15) "Let Me Eat Your Brains" [Dialogue spoken by Thom Matthews & Beverly Randolph]

16) DEAD BEAT DANCE - The Damned

17) END CREDIT MONTAGE

18) TRASH'S THEME - SSQ

x     x     x

Hope you enjoy it! If you dig it, leave a comment letting us know. And, of course, seed!
